header.title: Email on Birthday
header.description: If Birthdays are enabled this will send an email to the members on their birthday, can be turned off via ACP
header.author-notes: I had this feature on phpbb2 (thanks to Terrafrost) and wanted something like this on phpbb3 as well. Maybe someone else likes it so I publish it :)

changelog.change: added logging in ACP for emails sent
forgot to look at this http://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?p=5555715#p5555715 properly *sigh*
